item.description:
Location: TBD

 

Let's grab a bite after tennis Tues night because we'll all be starving.

 

All members welcome. You do not need to have attended the tennis meetup earlier - just bring your good appetite and good company.

 

Please comment with your suggestions for places to eat close to the courts for example in and around Arlington Center, Davis Square and Porter Square. I'll create a poll for those who are planning to attend once we have a few suggestions.
item.name: Post Tennis Feeding Frenzy
